title: Poco F4 GT launches w/ Snapdragon 8 Gen 1, 120W charging, physical shoulder triggers, more
content:
Xiaomi offshoot Pocophone has now officially launched yet another gaming-focused Android – this time in the form of the Poco F4 GT.

more…

The post Poco F4 GT launches w/ Snapdragon 8 Gen 1, 120W charging, physical shoulder triggers, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Xiaomi offshoot Pocophone has now officially launched yet another gaming-focused Android, this time in the form of the Poco F4 GT.
